subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Óscar Freire of Spain, a three-time world champion, won the second stage of the Vuelta a España in a sprint finish yesterday and took the overall lead. Freire, who rides for Rabobank, captured the 92-mile leg in 3 hours 31 minute 3 seconds. Erik Zabel of Team Milram trails Freire for the overall lead with the same time.
